===Etymology===
Originally a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=やまとことば|倭|tr1=Yamato|t1=ancient Japan|pos1=more commonly spelled as {{m|ja|大和}} in modern Japanese|言葉|tr2=kotoba|t2=word, language}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

The ''yamato'' reading for {{lang|ja|大和}} is irregular.
